attributes.action: Environmental impact traffic lights on food labelling
attributes.additional_details:
* European Environment Agency report 
https://www.eea.europa.eu/themes/agriculture/greening-agricultural-policy/food-security-and-environmental-impacts

* Article on changing habits 
https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/0/give-meat-completely-become-flexitarian-save-planet-say-experts/

https://www.theguardian.com/business/2018/nov/01/third-of-britons-have-stopped-or-reduced-meat-eating-vegan-vegetarian-report
attributes.background: Minimising the impact of food production on our planet is an imperative. The complexity of food products means that the environmental impact is unclear. Public food habits are changing and time for this to be on packaging so people can start to take control of their own environmental footprint.
